original_text: A very wonderful thing then appeared in the sky. I saw a woman who was wearing the sun like her clothes. The moon was under her feet. A crown of 12 stars was on her head.
korean_text: 하늘에 큰 이적이 보이니 해를 옷 입은 한 여자가 있는데 그 발 아래에는 달이 있고 그 머리에는 열두 별의 관을 썼더라

sentences.original_text: A very wonderful thing then appeared in the sky
who was wearing the sun like her clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여자는 태양을 옷처럼 입고 있었다

sentences.original_text: The moon was under her feet
A crown of 12 stars was on her head
sentences.korean_translation: 12개의 별로 만든 왕관이 그녀의 머리에 있었다
